meanings.definition: A polysaccharide composed of glucose units.
meanings.sent1: Glucan is a type of sugar made up of glucose units.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how glucan is formed in nature.
meanings.sent3: The playful bacteria danced around, forming glucan chains.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of cells, glucan acted as the sturdy tree trunk.
meanings.sent5: The glucan structure resembled a chain of tiny sugar bricks.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of polysaccharides that are composed of glucose units.
meanings.sent1: Glucan can be found in various forms in nature.
meanings.sent2: People consume foods rich in glucan for their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elves in the story used glucan as their secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was like a skyline of different types of glucan structures.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the glucan molecules looked like tiny sugar mountains.
